page.title: 19ECONOMIC SURVEY OF RAINHAM
page.content: Rainham's Economy is based on providing goods and services to a recently expanded urban population consistig to a large extent of commuters.The Business district consists of the High Street and Station Road and provides {Estate Agents}, {Building Societies},{Banks},{Car Sales and Service},{Solicitors},{Consumer Retail Outletst},and {Public Houses}. Some of these are houses in a new {Shopping Precinct}.Old {Brick Works} are to be found at Otterham Quay which is also a small Port.{Scrap Metal}, {Transport},{Food Packaging and Manufacturing} is also to be found. Agriculture is important.{Orchards}, {Market Gardening},and {Arable Farming} is found on the better land.A recent trend has been the introduction of {Pick-Your-Own} fruit.
